model

Class ItemDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ItemDAO

  • public class ItemDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Data access object class for Items. Used in accessing the table in the database.

      • readItemsByPerson

        public Item[] readItemsByPerson(int person_id)
        Method for reading Wishlist Items in the database that use a concrete Person
        Parameters:
        person_id - int referring to the Person that might be used for Wishlist Item
        Returns:
        Item[] Array containing all Items connected with this person in the database

      • readItemsByBought

        public Item[] readItemsByBought(boolean bought)
        Method for reading Wishlist Items in the database that are either bought or not bought
        Parameters:
        boolean - bought whether the item has been bought
        Returns:
        Item[] Array containing all Items that are bought/not bought

      • readOwnItems

        public Item[] readOwnItems()
        Method for reading Wishlist Items in the database whose connected person is null
        Returns:
        Item[] Array containing all Items with a null person in the database

      • readItemsForOthers

        public Item[] readItemsForOthers()
        Method for reading Wishlist Items in the database whose connected person is not null
        Returns:
        Item[] Array containing all Items with a not null person in the database
